summary: The bill, titled the Protecting the Dignity of Unborn Children Act of 2025, aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the unlawful disposal of fetal remains. It defines fetal remains, specifies prohibited disposal methods (landfill and navigable waters), and sets penalties for violations, including imprisonment and fines. The bill explicitly states that it does not authorize the prosecution of women for the disposal of their unborn child's remains.
